name: TimeShift (itch) (BlueBox Studios)
description:
This game is a 2D top-down shooter where you slow down time to your own liking!

The game was made in 2 days as a challange,  meaning the game is short, but still fun. Without the time warping, the game is impossibly difficult.  It is also made as an attemt to code slowing down/speeding up a game while playing.
